KnowledgeLog Log stuff

Make files recap

01 Nov 2014

Below is a basic makefile:

` //Setup what’s the end goal, in this case it’s client that should be resolved and what it depends on all: client

//Link them to the final runnable file, e.g. client in this example client: main.o HttpClient.o HttpResponse.o StringBufferHelper.o URL.o TCPClient.o g++ main.o HttpClient.o HttpResponse.o StringBufferHelper.o URL.o TCPClient.o -o client

//Compile all source to object files main.o: main.cpp g++ -c main.cpp

HttpClient.o: HttpClient.cpp HttpClient.h g++ -c HttpClient.cpp HttpClient.h

HttpResponse.o: HttpResponse.cpp HttpResponse.h g++ -c HttpResponse.cpp HttpResponse.h

StringBufferHelper.o: StringBufferHelper.cpp StringBufferHelper.h g++ -c StringBufferHelper.cpp StringBufferHelper.h

URL.o: URL.cpp URL.h g++ -c URL.cpp URL.h

TCPClient.o: TCPClient.cpp TCPClient.h g++ -c TCPClient.cpp TCPClient.h

hello.o: hello.cpp

# g++ -c hello.cpp

clean: rm -rf *o client

`
